decision_conditions: The description of development of Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/21/3280015, dated 23/06/2022, (Application ref. 40050/APP/2021/2467, dated 26/07/2021) is amended to the following:

"Change of use of offices (Use Class E(g)) to residential use (Use Class C3) (Application for Prior Approval under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class O of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015).)"

Condition 3 (Accordance with Approved Plans) is added to the decision notice for Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/21/3280015, dated 23/06/2022, (Application ref. 40050/APP/2021/2467, dated 26/07/2021) and states:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, references:-
22519LH 1 of 3 - Existing and Proposed North Building Elevations;
22519LH 2 of 3 - Existing and Proposed North Building Elevations; and
22519LH 3 of 3 - Existing and Proposed North Building Elevations.

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, all other conditions relating to Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/21/3280015, dated 23/06/2022 (Application ref. 40050/APP/2021/2467, dated 26/07/2021), must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
description:
Section 96a application for Non-Material Amendments to Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/21/3280015, dated 23/06/2022, (Application ref. 40050/APP/2021/2467, dated 26/07/2021) (Change of use of offices (Use Class E(g)) to residential use (Use Class C3) to include 64 residential units comprising 6 x studio units, 33 x one-bedroom units, 19 x two-bedroom units and 6 x three-bedroom units (Application for Prior Approval under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class O of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015).) in order to add a new condition which specifies the approved plans and amend the application description to remove reference to the numbers of homes as follows:

"Change of use of offices (Use Class E(g)) to residential use (Use Class C3) (Application for Prior Approval under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class O of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015).)"
